name: Avocado, Mint & Lime Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs mint leaves (save 2 tbs to garnish)
2 lime, rind finely grated, 1/4 cup juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Place mint leaves into a small bowl and cover with boiling water. Leave for 2 minutes, drain and refresh in iced water. Drain.
Halve avocados and remove stones. Scoop flesh into a food processor. Add condensed milk, lime rind, juice and mint leaves. Process until smooth. Add yoghurt and process to combine.

Transfer to an airtight container. Cover and freeze, stirring occasionally, for 3 hours or until almost frozen. Remove and process again until smooth. Return to the container, cover and freeze overnight or until firm.
When ready to serve, scoop into bowls. Garnish with extra mint leaves.
